translation.ko: 경찰이 시신을 못 찾을 거라고 어떻게 확신해요?

translation.en: Because it's someplace safe where nobody will find it.
translation.ko: 아무도 알 수 없는 안전한 곳이니까

translation.en: How do I know that in a month you don't go and jack the price up on me?
translation.ko: 갑자기 수수료를 안 올릴지는 어떻게 알죠?

translation.en: The minute I cash the first check, I am your partner.
translation.ko: 첫 수표를 현금화하는 순간 난 네 파트너야

translation.en: -I share the same risk. -You're my partner?
Okay, so I guess that means I gotta trust you, right?
We're gonna do the, um… we're gonna do the restaurant thing.
Good.
I'll put it in you and Carlton's name. Y'all take it from there.
translation.ko: 그쪽이랑 칼턴 이름으로 할 테니 거기서부턴 알아서 하세요

translation.en: After that, I don't wanna talk to you no more. I don't wanna see your face.
translation.ko: 그 이후로는 얼굴 맞대고 얘기하기 싫어요

translation.en: I don't wanna be associated with you anymore.
I don't know if I can do that, I mean,
I kinda thought maybe I'd be an… and actor,
and maybe you could give me a role in one of your movies.
translation.ko: 네 영화 중에 한자리 줄 수 있나?

translation.en: You just think you can shit on me, don't you?
You can shit all over me because I need your fucking help, is that what you think?
translation.ko: 도움이 필요한 처지라고 멋대로 해도 된다고 생각해요?

translation.en: Kid, just take a fucking shower.
Have a good shit. Stop waking up with dead girls in your bed,
translation.ko: 계속 죽은 여자들 옆에 끼고 잠에서 깨지 말고

translation.en: and this will go away.
You won't have to do this again. Can we get on with it?
translation.ko: 다신 이런 일 없을 거야 이제 진도 좀 나가지?

translation.en: How'd you get the body out of here?
It's a hotel, there's cameras everywhere, how'd you do it?
I had to break some bones.
Then I folded her up, into a little ball,
and I stuffed her into the cart.
We rolled that cart to the service elevator.
translation.ko: 그 카트를 화물 전용 엘리베이터에 넣고

translation.en: Fourth floor cameras are out, so we went to the fourth floor and then…
the trash chute's on the fourth floor, it leads down to the Cuthbert Street Dumpster.
translation.ko: 쓰레기 버리는 관도 4층에 있는데 커스버트가 쓰레기장으로 이어져

translation.en: You see, I used to have a contract with this place, this hotel. So…
And then I wrapped her in a tarp,
and your brother and I, we put her in the trunk of a car,
and we went away.
Okay.
But I got a question for you now.
How does it feel to be so rich?
You're unreal, man.
It's complicated.
[Ari] Well, I've got time.
[Kid] Bet you fucking do.
Everything I got, I earned. That's all me.
translation.ko: 모든 건 내 노력으로 일군 거예요

translation.en: I never had my hand out, I never took something that wasn't mine.
translation.ko: 손을 벌린 적도 남의 걸 뺏은 적도 없어요

translation.en: I never hurt anybody.
I took a lot of people with me.
A whole lot of fucking people. And all those people rely on me now.
translation.ko: 이제 수많은 사람이 저한테 의지하고 있죠

translation.en: And now you rely on me.
Being rich ain't that simple, Ari.
translation.ko: 부자로 사는 건 간단하지 않아요, 아리

translation.en: Just like you getting that dead body out of here, it's a lot of twists and turns.
translation.ko: 그쪽이 시체를 처리하는 것처럼 우여곡절이 많아요

translation.en: See, the funny thing about making money, the more you make, the more you realize
translation.ko: 돈을 버니까 알게 된 점은 돈을 더 벌면 벌수록

translation.en: the money is secondary to the decisions you make.
translation.ko: 뭔가를 결정할 때 돈이 주가 되지 않아요

translation.en: Sorry. You really believe that shit, right? Like…
No, I'm asking because I saw you on TV, you were doing all that motivational shit.
translation.ko: 네가 TV에서 동기 부여 어쩌고 하던 걸 봐서 묻는 거야

translation.en: And I thought it was just a bunch of crap, a gimmick,
but you're standing here telling me, and you actually believe it.
translation.ko: 근데 눈앞에서 들으니까 진짜 믿는 거 같네?

translation.en: -I do. -All right.
When people run up on me and talk shit and think they can get away with it,
translation.ko: 사람들은 절 만나서 아무 말이나 지껄였다가 넘어갈 수 있을 줄 아는데

translation.en: well, that's why that pisses me off. It annoys me.
It annoys the fuck out of me. Because of what I believe, well…
That's the reason these same people can't take advantage.
translation.ko: 이 사람들은 날 벗겨 먹으면 안 돼요

translation.en: Will you just write the fucking check?
I heard you.
Write the fucking check.
It's so easy to take too. Right?
Everybody can just fucking take from me.
-Why not? It's so fucking easy for me too. -Uh-huh.
'Cause everybody else assumes that it's easy,
but the difference between you and everybody else is that you…
you made a mistake.
You told me how to get the fucking body out!
You fucker!
Fuck you!
-[choking] -Fuck you! Fuck you!
Fuck you! Huh?
You wanna fucking take from me?
You wanna fucking take from me?
Fuck you.
Fuck you.
Get the fuck off me.
What's up? What you doing up? It's 2:00 a.m. there.
Patrick spent the night, and we watched a scary movie.
translation.ko: 패트릭이 놀러 와서 같이 무서운 영화 봤어요

translation.en: You're not supposed to watch scary movies.
I know, but I did.
Patrick's asleep, and now I'm afraid.
You ain't gotta be afraid, man.
I told you that. Plus, the monsters, they…
The monsters only come after the people that they know are scared.
Are you having fun?
No.
No, man, I'm not having fun.
Why don't you go to bed, okay? I'll call you in the morning.
Okay. Well, I love you.
I miss you.
-I miss you too. -[emotionally] Mm…
Go to bed, Dad.
What the fuck did you do?
I decided that I didn't wanna pay six million dollars.
♪ What do we have here now? Do you wanna ride or die? ♪ ♪ La la-da-la la la la la ♪
